description: Get your caffeine fix in overnight oatmeal form! These chilled, creamy Coffee Overnight Oats are super quick and easy to make and are a great way to use up leftover coffee in your pot!
keywords: cherry overnight oats, coffee overnight oats, overnight oatmeal
name: Coffee Overnight Oats
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon nut or seed butter (, or 2 tablespoons vegan yogurt )
1 tablespoon maple syrup (, or 1 finely chopped Medjool date)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the milk and nut/seed butter to a jar or other lidded container. Mix to combine them as well as you can.
Add all of the other ingredients and stir, or put the lid on and give it a good shake.
Put in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours or up to 5 days before enjoying either straight from the jar/container or spooned out into a bowl with toppings of choice.
